name: URwish Engineers
overview:
Established in the year 2005, we, “URwish Engineers”, are engaged in manufacturing and supplying an optimum quality range of Industrial Tank, Heat Exchanger Shell, SS Nut Bolt, Sprinkler Pin, Brass Moulding Insert, Automobile Turn Component and many. In this product range, we offer Fuel Tank, Transformer Tank, Storage Tank, Heat Exchanger and Cooler Assembly.

Company Policy: We at URwish Engineers are committed to enhance the customer satisfaction during the design and manufacturing of fabricated parts at our end.

Our Team: Technicians Engineers Quality auditors Design experts Skilled labors

Our Quality: We are a quality-oriented organisation focused on delivering premium quality Industrial Tank, Heat Exchanger Shell, SS Nut Bolt, Sprinkler Pin, Brass Moulding Insert, Automobile Turn Component to the clients.

Our Infrastructure: Our well-developed infrastructure facility has played an important part in our growth and success. Segregation of this facility into specialized divisions helps us ensure systematic and hassle-free business operations. Manufacturing unit is the integral part of our firm, which has a large production capacity of 10,000 sq. ft area with material handling facility.

Our Clients: India Railways Atlas Copco (I) Ltd, Nasik Graphite India Ltd., Ambad Jyoti Structures Ltd., Nashik Herald Engineers, Nasik
